com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly
Interface BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IDecorator

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultInterstitialDecorator
Enclosing class:
BurstlyFullscreenActivity
public static interface BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IDecorator

The intention of this decorator is to decorate view, that will be shown as an interstitial.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii

Method Summary
 View decorate(View adView, Activity fullscreenActivity)
          Decorate source view to allow arbitrary interstitial decoration.
 View decorate(View adView, IOverlayContainer shownOverlay)
          Decorate source view to allow arbitrary interstitial decoration.
 

Method Detail

decorate

View decorate(View adView,
              Activity fullscreenActivity)
Decorate source view to allow arbitrary interstitial decoration.

Parameters:
adView - View interstitial view to be shown
fullscreenActivity - Activity in which this view will be placed
Returns:
View decorated view that holds source interstitial view

decorate

View decorate(View adView,
              IOverlayContainer shownOverlay)
Decorate source view to allow arbitrary interstitial decoration. This view will not be opened as a new activity, instead it will be opened in an overlay view on the top of a view hierarchy, hence simultaing a fullscreen.

Parameters:
adView - View interstitial view to be shown
shownOverlay - IOverlayContainer shown overlay view
Returns:
View decorated view that holds source interstitial view
